challenge: Optimize supply chain logistics for 100 warehouses with interdependent constraints. Classical approach: brute force optimization requiring 48+ hours. Thiele approach: discover warehouse clusters and optimize independently.

classical_strategy.result: SUCCESS - But requires 2 days of compute time

thiele_strategy.result: SUCCESS - Immediate results after one-time analysis

economic_superiority.conclusion: Thiele Machine achieves massive economic advantage through partition-aware optimization

real_world_context.industry_impact: Warehouse logistics, inventory management, delivery routing
real_world_context.thiele_advantage: Identifies independent warehouse clusters, enables parallel optimization
